titleStmt.title: In Bridges-Street, just over against the King's Play-house, near Covent-Garden, at Mr. Edward Stevenson, liveth Anthony Bellon, doctor of phisick in the University of Montpellier, newly come over.
titleStmt.author: Bellon, Anthony.

notesStmt.note: At end of text: "He my be Spoken at his Dwelling-House from 9 a Clock in the Morning till one a Clock in the Afternoon.".
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
